definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 裡邊|里边[li3 bian5]

sentences.english: On the inside is a traditional Chinese painting of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 里边画的是一幅中国传统花鸟画。

sentences.english: And she started dyeing her stockings and blouses there too.
sentences.chinese: 同时在宿舍里边，她开始用颜料染着袜子和上衣。

sentences.english: They even have special insoles to support the arches of my feet.
sentences.chinese: 鞋里边还有内垫呢，这样就能更好地支撑我的脚了。

sentences.english: I also spot Stone in a cameo I hadn't noticed before. He's plays a moneyman, a financier.
sentences.chinese: 我发现斯通也在里边露了脸，扮演一个有钱的金融家。

sentences.english: Inside all wholesale and some wholesale house has several floors.
sentences.chinese: 里边全是批发的，有些批发家还几层楼的。

sentences.english: You would want to see the inside too.
sentences.chinese: 您一定也想到里边去看看。

sentences.english: You can even add drops of hand-wash gel to the water and stir it, before dipping your hands in it.
sentences.chinese: 在泡手前，在里边加点洗手液然后搅一搅当然更好。

sentences.english: Soundproof glass muffled any noise, however.
sentences.chinese: 隔音玻璃挡住了里边的动静。

sentences.english: Goodspeed, you want to watch? There's something wonderful inside.
sentences.chinese: 朱宏，你想不想看？里边很精彩的哟。

sentences.english: Question: What is your best memory on the period you experienced in Eindhoven?
sentences.chinese: 在埃因霍温时你所经历的里边哪件事情是你最美好？

sentences.english: Only the Lobgevity Hill remains inside the Summer Palace.
sentences.chinese: 只有这万寿山在颐和园里边。

sentences.english: Once he’s inside you, have him sit up so you’re face-to-face.
sentences.chinese: 他一旦在里边了，让他坐直以便你们面对面。

sentences.english: Many years ago, my granduncle is a chef there.
sentences.chinese: 很多年前，我的舅父是里边的御厨。

sentences.english: Anger was washed away in the river along with any obligation.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒在河里边洗掉了，任何义务职责也一同洗掉了。

sentences.english: It's fun after being out in the sticks for so long. " Weeling laughed."
sentences.chinese: 因为很好玩尤其在里边呆的愈久”韦灵大笑起来。

sentences.english: Let's get to work, "said Gary and he picked up the spade ."
sentences.chinese: “大家开始干吧”，加里边说边抄起铁锹。

definition: outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
outside (also pr. [wai4 mian5] for this sense)/surface/exterior/external appearance
there/that place/also written 那裡|那里
